titles.title: A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to authorize certain community water systems to enter into partnerships to improve the water systems, and for other purposes.
Voluntary Water Partnership for Distressed Communities Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
